When Jesus was upon earth, He announced his mission and the character of his work. He said, "The Spirit of the Lord is upon Me, because He hath 
                                                                           2
anointed Me to preach the gospel to the poor: He hath sent Me to heal the broken-hearted, to preach deliverance to the captives, and recovering of sight to the blind, to set at liberty them that are bruised, to preach the acceptable year of the Lord." Luke 4:18, 19.
